member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationFactory
member.summary: Creates an instance of known configuration types from command line arguments and provides configuration options description.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationFactory.TryCreate(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Creates an instance of known configuration types from command line arguments.
member.returns: New instance of configuration populated from command line arguments.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationFactory.TryGetConfigurationOptions(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides description for configuration options of known configuration types.
